item.title: Human-centered machine vision?
item.description: From the Click and Collect: Show Me Your Dataset event at Somerset House. See the twitter thread. I presented ongoing research on [[public_notes/Creanalytics|Creanalytics]] forthcoming as an article in a special issue on Critical Technical Practice in the journal Convergence.

item.title: Transmediale 2023
item.description: I attended Transmediale and gave a very small presentation as part of the panel Toward Minor Tech.
